section.title: Into the Woods
section.p: One day, what seemed like just another ordinary day turned out to be much more than that. Maurice gets lost on his way to a fair and ends up coming across the castle where the beast lives. Due to bad weather, he decides to take cover inside. Unaware that a beast lives here, he startles the beast, angering it. As a result, the dad is made a prisoner until Belle finds him and exchanges her freedom for his, trading places.

The beast, once a prince, was turned into this horrendous creature by a mysterious woman one fateful night as punishment for being selfish and cruel. The prince is cursed to remain a beast until he learns to love and be loved in return by a human woman. The curse will end if he can do this before the last petal falls from an enchanted rose.

section.title: Into the Woods
section.p: One day, what seemed like just another ordinary day turned out to be much more than that. Maurice gets lost on his way to the fair to present his latest creation and ends up stumbling upon the castle of the beast. Due to a raging storm outside, he decides to seek refuge inside. Unaware that the beast resides here, he startles the owner of the dreary home and angers it. Seeing as he is an unwelcome guest, he is made a prisoner--that is, until Belle exchanges her freedom for his, becoming the prisoner herself.

The beast, once a prince, was turned into this horrendous creature by a mysterious woman one fateful, dark night as punishment for being selfish and cruel. The prince is cursed to remain a beast until he learns to love and be loved in return by a human woman. The curse will end if he can do this before the last petal falls from an enchanted rose.
